title: Peace of Westphalia
summary: The peace treaty which ended the %{Thirty Years War#Thirty Years War}, practically dissolving the Holy Roman Empire, and allowing German Princes to pick between Calvinism, as well as teh options of Lutheranism and Catholicism from the Peace of Augsburg. It also marked a clear transition towards #{secularism} within international diplomacy, as the Catholic Church was excluded from the creation of the treaty.
